overview: Aimee (Stormy) is a beautiful secretary who is looking to get ahead at her job, where she is the only female. Once she hears about an upcoming promotion within the company, Aimee becomes determined to prove to her boss that she is the right 'man' for the job, but will her boss take her seriously? Aimee decides to throw a dinner party with her boss as the guest of honor in hopes of impressing him enough so that he gives her the promotion. What Aimee soon discovers though is that climbing your way to the top is not as easy as it seems, but in the end the payoff is worth the effort.
title: What's a Girl Gotta Do?
